Also, add an Organic No-Show Sock 3-pack for only $8.90 $12.90

The classic chino, upgraded. We spent a year perfecting a fit for guys who want a bit more room in the seat and thigh, while still having a flattering taper below the knee. The ultra-smooth yet sturdy Organic Cotton twill is the perfect balance of laid-back and refined. Added features like Activeflexâ„¢ fabric and a hidden cell-phone pocket will have you reaching for this pant every day of the week.
Material: 98% Organic Cotton Twill, 2% Spandex
FIt: Straight fit in the seat and thigh, moderate taper below the knee
Custom wash process for a soft, buttery hand feel
Hidden cell phone pocket at front (fits iPhone XS)
Zipper fly, button front
Belt loops at waistband
Certified organic cotton fiber. Organic fibers aren't treated with pesticides, insecticides, or herbicides, and conserve more natural resources like water
Model is 6'1 and wearing a size 32X30
Machine wash cold.  Gentle cycle with like colors.  Do not bleach.  Tumble dry low.  Low iron if necessary.  Do not dry clean
